department: Public Works and Government Services, Canada
description: The work involves the modernization of one hydraulic elevator at the Pacific Forestry Centre, Victoria, BC.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify: Pacific Forestry Centre Elevator Modernization

*   [English Title](#English-Title): Invitation to Qualify: 234519-230639 Pacific Forestry Centre Elevator Modernization
*   [French Title](#French-Title): Invitation à se qualifier: 234519-230639 Modernisation d‘un ascenseur au Centre de foresterie du Pacifique

## Details of the Invitation to Qualify

*   Solicitation Number: WS 411 061 4534
*   Date of Publication: 2023-07-24
*   Closing Date and Time for Submissions: 2023-08-10, 2:00 PM (Pacific Daylight Time)
*   Expected Start Date of Contract: 2023-09-11
*   Expected End Date of Contract: None
*   Status: Expired

## Classification and Key Activities

*   Classification: Construction and Maintenance Services
*   Type of Tender: Competitive, Open-Book Tender
*   Evaluation Criteria: Price

## Services and Supplies

*   Work involved in this contract includes the modernization of one hydraulic elevator at the Pacific Forestry Centre, Victoria, B.C.
*   Services to be performed include:
    *   Providing all engineering, design drawings, materials, shipping, and methods for the modernization of the elevator and related work
    *   Providing all labor, permits, and costs for provincial elevator acceptance inspections and design submissions covering the elevator modernization work
    *   Managing all subcontractors necessary to complete the elevator modernization, including related work
    *   Ensuring that all subcontractors are coordinated and cooperate with each other to ensure efficient completion and satisfactory workmanship at completion

## Additional Tender Details

*   The base price includes all coordination between related trades and provision of access to the elevator hoistway, pit, and machine room, as necessary, to complete the related work.
*   A vendor must at Blackblume form



Region(s) of Opportunity:
 Canada and British Columbia

Commercial agreement:
 Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
